alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Randolph; Sharp (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 9:34PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Randolph, northeastern Fulton and northeastern Sharp Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 933 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mammoth Spring, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pocahontas... Mammoth Spring... Hardy... Maynard... Ravenden Springs... Attica... Mammoth Spring State Park... Dalton... Armstrong... Brakebill... Middlebrook... Warm Springs... Ingram... Saddler Falls... Eleven Point... Wirth... Hamil... Stokes... Elm Store... Brockett... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for eastern and north central Arkansas.
